Walk-in COVID-19 testing centres and wait times | Gouvernement du Québec
New health instructions and curfew in force throughout Québec. Avoid travel and
consult the measures that apply in your region
to learn the details. You can also consult
Walk-in COVID-19 testing centres and wait times

The wait time to get tested for COVID-19 is shown for each walk-in testing clinic. Wait times are updated hourly between 8 a.m. and 6 p.m. Please note that walk-in testing clinics are not available in all regions.
If a clinic's wait time is not available during data collection, “Not available” is indicated under wait time.
If the clinic is closed during data collection, “Closed” is indicated under wait time.
To find out if you should get
